• For Hosts
    A Powerful App to Manage All Airbnb Operations

    Features include smart scheduling, a built-in PMS, and a trusted cleaning marketplace

    Cleaner Network
    • Find Cleaners Nearby Assign tasks, share files, and communicate with your team.
    • Verified Professionals Assign tasks, share files, and communicate with your team.
    • Turnover Automation Streamlines turnovers for platform cleaners or your own staff.
    AI House Intelligence
    • Turnover Guidance Computer vision detects layout mistakes & cleaning issues.
    • Damage Detection Flags missing items and damage post-checkout.
    • Real-time Property Manual Auto-generates room manuals from video + chat
    Solutions
    • Individual Hosts Find cleaners and let AI inspect cleaning & lost items.
    • Property Managers Streamline turnovers and monitor property condition at scale
    • Software Developers Bring the full power of LodgeMatic into your product via API.
    PMS Integrations

    We're actively building integrations with leading Property Management Systems (PMS) to make your operations even more streamlined.
